product_name: REI La Selva Rain Jacket - Women's
long_description: The REI La Selva is our storm-worthy trench-style jacket offering wet-weather protection and smart versatility. Believe it or not, you'll actually look forward to rainy days! Made of a beautiful 2-layer nylon/polyester blend fabric, the breathable REI Elements(R)-rated shell is waterproof and windproof to 60 mph. All seams are sealed for complete protection. Adjustable hood can be zipped off when it's not needed. 2-way front zipper with stormflaps offers a versatile fit and protective comfort. Removable belt has a buckle adjustment and 3 bonded belt loops to hold it in place. Bonded cuff tabs with buckles and rip-and-stick adjustments. Bonded flaps cover 2 drop-in pockets and 2 zip hand pockets. Interior document pocket; zip stash pocket has earphone cord port. REI La Selva jacket features a classic, easy-wearing fit.
short_description: The REI La Selva is our storm-worthy trench-style jacket offering wet-weather protection and smart versatility. Believe it or not, you'll actually look forward to rainy days!
